column4: does anyone know if the version of ktorrent that comes with feisty is 2.1.4? When you hit "about ktorrent" in the app all they say is "2.1", that really bugs me.
or does that mean I am literally running 2.1?
yeah..well, for starters I just want to know what I'm running. heh
Looks like just 2.1-0ubuntu2, I did `aptitude show ktorrent`
